text:
The National Association
of Educational Broadcasters
ANNOUNCES THE OPENING OF ITS
WASHINGTON OFFICE
UNDER THE DIRECTION OF
WILLIAM G. HARLEY
DUPONT CIRCLE BUILDING
1346 CONNECTICUT AVENUE
WASHINGTON 6, D. C.
SEPTEMBER. 1960
TELEPHONE
NORTH 7-6000
General. Office: 119 Gregory hall. Urbana. Illinois
